title: Delicious turkey burgers
ingredients: ['1.3kg (3 lb) minced turkey', '30g (1 oz) dried breadcrumbs', '1/2 onion, finely diced', '2 egg whites, lightly beaten', 'small handful chopped fresh parsley', '1 clove garlic, peeled and minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']
